verses.verse: ויען <WH6030> answered איוב <WH347> Then Job ויאמר׃ <WH559> and said,
גם <WH1571> Even היום <WH3117> today מרי <WH4805> bitter: שׂחי <WH7879> my complaint ידי <WH3027> my stroke כבדה <WH3513> is heavier על <WH5921> than אנחתי׃ <WH585> my groaning.
מי <WH4310> יתןדעתי <WH3045> I knew ואמצאהו <WH4672> where I might find אבוא <WH935> him! I might come עד <WH5704> to תכונתו׃ <WH8499> his seat!
אערכה <WH6186> I would order לפניו <WH6440> before משׁפט <WH4941> cause ופי <WH6310> my mouth אמלא <WH4390> him, and fill תוכחות׃ <WH8433> with arguments.
אדעה <WH3045> I would know מלים <WH4405> the words יענני <WH6030> he would answer ואבינה <WH995> me, and understand מה <WH4100> what יאמר׃ <WH559> he would say
הברב <WH7227> כח <WH3581> power? יריב <WH7378> Will he plead עמדי <WH5978> against לא <WH3808> No; אך <WH389> but הוא <WH1931> he ישׂם׃ <WH7760> would put
שׁם <WH8033> There ישׁר <WH3477> the righteous נוכח <WH3198> might dispute עמו <WH5973> with ואפלטה <WH6403> him; so should I be delivered לנצח <WH5331> forever משׁפטי׃ <WH8199> from my judge.
הן <WH2005> Behold, קדם <WH6924> forward, אהלך <WH1980> I go ואיננו <WH369> but he not ואחור <WH268> and backward, ולא <WH3808> but I cannot אבין׃ <WH995> perceive

שׂמאול <WH8040> On the left hand, בעשׂתו <WH6213> where he doth work, ולא <WH3808> but I cannot אחז <WH2372> behold יעטף <WH5848> he hideth ימין <WH3225> himself on the right hand, ולא <WH3808> that I cannot אראה׃ <WH7200> see
כי <WH3588> But ידע <WH3045> he knoweth דרך <WH1870> the way עמדי <WH5978> that I take: בחנני <WH974> he hath tried כזהב <WH2091> as gold. אצא׃ <WH3318> me, I shall come forth
באשׁרו <WH838> his steps, אחזה <WH270> hath held רגלי <WH7272> My foot דרכו <WH1870> his way שׁמרתי <WH8104> have I kept, ולא <WH3808> and not אט׃ <WH5186> declined.

מצות <WH4687> from the commandment שׂפתיו <WH8193> of his lips; ולא <WH3808> Neither אמישׁ <WH4185> have I gone back מחקי <WH2706> more than my necessary צפנתי <WH6845> I have esteemed אמרי <WH561> the words פיו׃ <WH6310> of his mouth
והוא <WH1931> But he באחד <WH259> in one ומי <WH4310> and who ישׁיבנו <WH7725> can turn ונפשׁו <WH5315> him? and his soul אותה <WH183> desireth, ויעשׂ׃ <WH6213> even he doeth.
כי <WH3588> For ישׁלים <WH7999> he performeth חקי <WH2706> appointed וכהנה <WH2007> such רבות <WH7227> for me: and many עמו׃ <WH5973> with
על <WH5921> כןפניו <WH6440> at his presence: אבהל <WH926> am I troubled אתבונן <WH995> when I consider, ואפחד <WH6342> I am afraid ממנו׃ <WH4480> at his presence:
ואל <WH410> For God הרך <WH7401> maketh my heart soft לבי <WH3820> maketh my heart soft ושׁדי <WH7706> and the Almighty הבהילני׃ <WH926> troubleth
כי <WH3588> Because לא <WH3808> I was not נצמתי <WH6789> cut off מפני <WH6440> before חשׁך <WH2822> the darkness, ומפני <WH6440> from my face. כסה <WH3680> hath he covered אפל׃ <WH652> the darkness
